snippet: LEAD: Under pressure from environmentalist groups, the Pacific Lumber Company said today that it would reverse its two-year-old policy of accelerated cutting of trees in virgin redwood forests....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Under pressure from environmentalist groups, the Pacific Lumber Company said today that it would reverse its two-year-old policy of accelerated cutting of trees in virgin redwood forests.

headline.main: Company Eases Its Policy on Logging of Redwoods

byline.original: By LAWRENCE M. FISHER, Special to the New York Times
